entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
